website_summaries.verdict: Ultimate adjustable shoe for a custom fit.
pros: We love how the three hook-and-loop closures and cushioning footbed makes it feel as if you are walking on air
cons: When straps are expanded, it exposes the Velcro

customer_reviews.title: I absolutely love them. I ordered the black first
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these shoes because of the velcro adjustable straps, I have severe arthritis in my feet. One is larger than the other. I've had 7 surgeries on them for bunions and hammer toes. I put them on and wore them all day. They were a God send for me. I absolutely love them. I ordered the black first, I liked them so well I ordered them in red . For Spring I plan to order them in brown , and maybe white as well. This sandal is perfect for anyone with foot problems . I would highly recommend these little sandals . O yea, they are cute and stylish as well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable, but...
customer_reviews.text: These are very comfortable, as I would expect a good pair of Clarks to be. The adjustable straps are nice, but unless you have a very small arch, you will have to loosen them. This exposes the Velcro and makes the shoe less attractive. Also, I imagine over time stuff would stick to the Velcro making the appearance worse.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, Cute, Good Buy on Sale!
customer_reviews.text: I now own these sandals in 4 different colors. I wear an 8.5 Medium in Clarks shoes which in my opinion run just a bit larger than most other shoes, something I learned after buying the first pair in a size 9 several years ago. My "flat-footed feet are a B medium width, narrow AA heel and I am a pronator (means my feet roll in when walking), which is common for people with basically flat feet. The adjustable straps are great. The support is good for me, a "plus size" woman. (Size 1 X in clothes).
customer_reviews.author: P. Burdge

customer_reviews.title: Ahhhhhh-dorable!!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these in 'brown-multi', one of those 'throw-in' types of purchases (I was actually shopping for black sandals!) and, boy am I glad I purchased them!!! They are SOOOOOOOO cute, SOOOOOOOO comfy! With the three adjustable straps, I was afraid they might look 'old lady', but they don't...and the two-colored brown-multi with the tiny brass studs is just "THE" perfect retro look! I was away on vacay, threw them on with denim shorts and a white tee, some turquoise jewelry...PERFECT!!! Everybody wanted to know where I got those SHOES!!!
customer_reviews.author: CatWhispurrer

customer_reviews.title: Great Sandals
customer_reviews.text: These are great sandals. Not as much arch support as I had hoped for, but I have been spoiled by my leather Clarks flip-flops. The arch support is just fine, I just have ludicrously high arches, normal humans or even mildly high arched folks will be just fine with these. I also like the versatility of the velcro but I was worried of the aesthetics of it. Turns out from a foot and a half away you can't even see the velcro! (I have the black sandals, may not be the case with other colors.) So seeing as most folks are more than a foot and a half away from my feet I'm good!
customer_reviews.author: JLW

customer_reviews.title: Great sandals!
customer_reviews.text: I was a little hesitant to order sandals online, since I often struggle to find the right fit, but in store shopping isn’t an option right now. My feet are often too narrow for a medium, but too wide for a narrow, which is why I usually have to try on half a dozen styles before I find something that’s good enough, but often still not a perfect fit. These sandals clearly run a little on the narrow side, so the medium width is perfect for me. The sandals are also cute with a comfortable footbed, so they check all the boxes for me.
customer_reviews.author: schnappsersTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Pretty Nice!
customer_reviews.text: Pretty nice! I love the look of these and the adjustability is paramount for me, as my two feet are a bit different in size. The only knock I have is the comfort of those straps going across the top of my feet. They are a little scratchy so I'm not sure I'd wear them for long periods of time. I'm hoping the leather will soften and "age" a bit as time goes on and they'll feel more comfortable. The foot bed is VERY comfortable! Lots of nice cushion there. Otherwise, they are very nice and I love the look of them.
customer_reviews.author: Davejostef

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic sandals, can wear them all day
customer_reviews.text: I have two pairs for these Clarks Sandals. I use them for work and am comfortable with them all day long. I need a slightly larger shoe on my left foot ever since I had ankle surgery years ago. The brilliant design of this sandal allows me to adjust all straps just right on the 'problem' foot, while still matching the one on the right. - The soles are very comfortable and cushioned. -- I tried two pairs of Birkenstock as well, but neither allowed for enough adjustment... not by a long shot. You can't beat Clarks! And this particular sandal is especially great!
customer_reviews.author: Britta

customer_reviews.title: I love these shoes
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes. I wear the Coral ones every day. Have had my oldest pair about 2 years and they are still going strong but showing just a little wear. Although these are advertised as "Sage (something)" but they are a lovely taupe. Velcro adjustments on 3 side straps make these a perfect fit.
customer_reviews.author: latergators1969

customer_reviews.title: Quality, Price and Acurate Sizes!
customer_reviews.text: I love Clark’s shoes. My favorites are slide on or Mules. These Red slides are really beautiful. Leather shoe, great arch support, 3 adjustible velcro straps and a beautiful red color. I wear clarks almost every day, because my feet can really swell and hurt after standing on them 8-10 hours a day. The solid construction of the shoe along with the soft and shapely insole help my feet immeasurably. Clarks are true to size. I wear a size 10 shoe and i can order a size 10 Clark shoe with no worry of size . Buy clarks shoes and enjoy a new fresher not so tired foot!
customer_reviews.author: Lori Temple Meyer

customer_reviews.title: Great, comfortable everyday slip ons.
customer_reviews.text: After all these are CLARKS!!!! Love'em!!! Very, very comfy, versatile, everyday slip ons can wear then with shorts, capris, informal skirts, summer dresses and of course jeans. This has been my go-to pair for the past year. Also got one for my mom and she loves them as well. My mother wears them with her Indian sarees as well so I guess they can be formal too!!! The delivery was quick, hassle-free and came in original Clarks shoe box. Just love them. I will buy another one if and when the ones I have wear out. Absolutely worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Kalyani

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed in wide size. Maybe mislabeled??
customer_reviews.text: Maybe a defective item or labeled wrong. I had previously ordered an 8.5 medium with in black, which I loved. It initially fit all right and I figured the leather would stretch as I broke them in. Those are super comfortable now. So I ordered the same style in red and decided to try them in a wide size to hopefully give a little more room. Unfortunately, the red came uncomfortably tight, which makes no sense that it felt tighter than the medium width shoe.
customer_reviews.author: AA_Mama

customer_reviews.title: Comfy Shoe
customer_reviews.text: I have a bad foot that requires surgery although I cannot afford to be down for a year. Finally found a shoe that is comfortable on my feet. Shoe runs true to size. Although I ordered a narrow and you actually need a medium or wide if you have swollen feet or a bunion with deformed toes. The narrow work it just shows more velcro than I want but it will do. Next shoes I know to order a medium or wide. You can adjust the straps to fit. and the shoe has so much support and comfy.
customer_reviews.author: robert

customer_reviews.title: Give it a min
customer_reviews.text: At first they were a bit stiff but it didn’t take long for them to soften up and are very comfortable. I wish they came in half sizes as I’m a 6.5 and I opted for the 6. It works but that .5 would be better
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: Is longer & more narrow than other Clark sandals I have.
customer_reviews.text: I have another clark sandal that is made like this one. I decided on a 9.5 medium width & they fit perfectly. So I purchased this sandal in a brown of the same size. This one is more narrow & longer. I should have returned it for a 9, but needed it, so I kept them. Also, the first sandal I described had good arch support while this one doesn’t & the footbed feels like it curves upward. I wish they had brown in the other sandal.
customer_reviews.author: Smart

customer_reviews.title: A Little Snug, But Velcro Allows for Adjustments
customer_reviews.text: I love Clarks sandals..In the nice weather, they are the only shoes I wear. I have wide feet, and I appreciate these coming in wide, although they could have been a bit wider. I know, though, that because they are leather, they will stretch, and the velcro closures will make it so I can wear them now, and still wear them after stretching. This particular style is a new purchase for me. Last time, I bought these:  which I like better, but they no longer carry. This new sandal is a nice looking shoe, and I think I will enjoy it quite a lot, as the weather warms up.
customer_reviews.author: Hydrangea Butternut

customer_reviews.title: Cute & comfortable but minimal arch support
customer_reviews.text: I wear a size 7 US and these are true to size. Comfortable, cute & adjustable. All 3 straps can be adjusted for a custom fit. However, I have a high arch & the arch support us minimal at best. Wish that could be adjusted. We'll see if my feet hurt after wearing at work all day. UPDATE: Work them for two very busy days at the hospital and my feet were fine.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable from the very beginning!
customer_reviews.text: I slide my feet into these shoes and I could tell they would work for me. I have bunions, as well as a bad ankle and knees. I would live in flip flops, but they provide no support. These sandals are perfect because they’re cute, comfortable and they hold my foot well.
customer_reviews.author: Pamiami

customer_reviews.title: My Mom's Favorite Sandals
customer_reviews.text: My Mom has had a pair of these Clark's for years. In fact, she's had them for so long, the fabric in the sandal had started to rip and fray...but the leather and the sole of the shoe was still in great condition. She tends to wear the sandal all year-round, so I bought her another pair in a different color. Fast forward to a week after I purchased a pair for my Mom and I noticed that my sister had on the exact same pair too! The next pair I purchase will be for me!
customer_reviews.author: TMD

customer_reviews.title: Nice shoe, like the velcro, just not as comfortable as expected.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this shoe because I needed something comfortable for my feet. I was looking for something with soft/memory foam like insole. While this shoe is nice, and I like the ability to adjust the straps (pleasantly surprised these have Velcro) the insole is just not the level of softness/comfort I was looking for. These shows are good for someone who has feet that swell (you can adjust the straps looser/tighter) but not that great for someone with heel problems or weight problems looking for relief on the bottom of the foot. Nice shoe, adjustable, just not the level of comfort I needed.
customer_reviews.author: GWYNDOLYN

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, Fashionable and Reasonably Priced Sandals
customer_reviews.text: I like this brand and have other Clark's sandals. I love the fit, comfort and sole of the product. I especially like the absence of the ugly white outer sole. The other great feature of the sandal is the adjustable strap--3 of them. I also like that it is not a thong since my feet do not tolerate that style. The color is pewter but it more silver like with a bit of shine which looks very nice. Of course, the price was right since these tend to be expensive at retail but this was discounted and the comfort and versatility of this sandal is worth it--it is very durable, lasts a long time.
customer_reviews.author: tennistoni

customer_reviews.title: Returning
customer_reviews.text: I have 2 other pairs of Clarks's shoes and 2 other shoes that are almost identicle to Clarks sandal. They fit well. I tried them on as I was excited to get a new pair. I buy Wides in all my shoes and wear 9;s and 9 1/2's. The left shoe fits a lil snug but the middle strap on the right sandal does not close aat all. I thought it may be that my foot was swollen so I waited to see if it will fit a week later. Nope. cannot wear the right shoe at all. The Velcto does not meet one another. No more buying online shoes.
customer_reviews.author: MariCarrie

customer_reviews.title: Elated!
customer_reviews.text: With a hard to fit 12 AAAA, I can only wear shoes from SAS or Munro American, which are very expensive and less stylish. I was elated to find these at $65-150 less than the other 2 brands I own. The footbed padding and arch support could be better, but I was just elated to find a "cute" sandal for the summer that fit. I didn't even have to adjust the velcro; it fit straight out of the box. I will buy another pair. (The dress pumps I bought from the same brand thinking those would fit was, sadly, a mistake. But I've pleased with the sandals.)
customer_reviews.author: Reading Mom of 3

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply made clarks
customer_reviews.text: I have bought many pairs of Clarks sandals, including this style in other colors, so I also ordered this pair in black. However, unlike the four other pairs in my closet which came with rubber soles, these particular shoes have plastic soles. They are slippery and I don't feel safe sliding around in them. Not sure why these are made pretty flimsy compared to my other Clarks, but buyer beware. I'm sending them back. FYI Peltz shoes will not pay return shipping on defective items (interior of shoe is sewn wrong, bumps in shoe) so expect that you are PAYING to try on defective, poorly made shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Mysterious Stranger

customer_reviews.title: These are knockoff Clarks
customer_reviews.text: These are knockoff shoes. Upper material is not leather, bed of shoe feels like plastic and no cushioning. I do wear Clarks sandals and have ordered before from Amazon but normally from shoe vendors. Buyer beware and I missed the refund date because I bought them earlier and just tried wearing them this week. Going in garbage .
customer_reviews.author: Judith D.

customer_reviews.title: Most comfortable summer sandal I've ever worn!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this style several years ago and it quickly became my "go to" summer footwear. The three straps with hidden Velcro tabs allow for easy adjustment when the heat and humidity soar. The sandals are very durable, and I ordered this pair in anticipation of next summer, because my original pair is becoming worn in the interior heel area. The rest of the sandal shows minimal signs of the almost daily wear. The denim blue is a few shades darker this time around, but it is still a perfect shade for summer.
customer_reviews.author: PABookLady

customer_reviews.title: comfortable and good looking
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable to wear, especially with bunions. I will be buying at least one or two more pairs as I wear this type of shoe just about all year round as we live in a warm climate...you want comfort and great value and they last for years. My last pair which are 5 years are pretty ragged looking and really need to go.
customer_reviews.author: Cizillie

customer_reviews.title: Soft and comfortable.  True to size and long lasting, well made shoes!
customer_reviews.text: Love them! Super fit and so comfortable. True to size and a soft footbed with adjustable straps. Love the leather. It is soft and pliable and they get more comfortable with wear. Long lasting - I’ve had a pair for about 3 years and still wear them around the house and to do errands. I wear the new shoes out and about to a little nicer functions. I do highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Waitingformyshepherd

customer_reviews.title: My Favorite Sandal
customer_reviews.text: As I get older - not that I'm old! - I look for comfort in a shoe first. This sandal is comfort for me. I have worn out several pairs because I wear them all year round - for every occasion. When I find something that works, I stick with it. The sandal can be adjusted to fit the foot just right because each strap has velcro adjusters to tighten or loosen. I always get black sandals to go with everything but I have thought about different colors. Great sandal!
customer_reviews.author: Nancy J

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful color and quality.
customer_reviews.text: I bought two pairs, one pewter and one natural tan. I love them both. This is the second summer season to wear them and I highly recommend Clark's for quality and so comfortable. I can wear all day, and I have problem feet. I love the velcro straps that I can extend to compensate for the bunions on my seventy-four year old feet.
customer_reviews.author: Datsmar

customer_reviews.title: Sole and foot bed changes are awful!!
customer_reviews.text: I have 4 pairs of these sandals. I absolutely loved them. The newest pair I just purchased has a more plastic sole, which makes the bed less flexible. The sole on all of my other sandals are more rubberized and comfortable. The bed used to feel more like suede now it feels like hard leather. The seam is cutting into my arch. They are extremely uncomfortable compared to my previous pairs. I am sending them back. I am sad that Clarks has changed the way that they manufacture these sandals because they are absolutely inferior.
customer_reviews.author: Leisa B

customer_reviews.title: Great comfortable sandal with adjustable fit!
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable sandal with some arch support and cushioning. Love that all three straps are adjustable w velcro! Makes it easy to adjust fit All across front of foot! I have a low instep (top of foot in front of ankle) and sandals are always floppy in that area, so the adjustable strap is perfect. Also, as shoes stretch, you can readjust the fit! My second pair — first pair in blue has lasted 2 yrs with almost daily wear in season and still look great!
customer_reviews.author: kathy r.

customer_reviews.title: Great sandals!
customer_reviews.text: These are my first pair of sandals by Clark's. I have a wide foot mostly because of bunions. I ordered my size and I have to say they run just a little bit big. Also, the straps are adjustable, so that does help. The sandals are very comfortable and easy to walk in. There is a lot of support which is important to me. I will definitely buy another pair of Clark's shoes or sandals.
customer_reviews.author: andmas1964

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable!!
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are amazing! They are so comfortable, I don’t have a single complaint. Buy them!!
customer_reviews.author: Donna Kelley

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful fit and comfort.
customer_reviews.text: I did not think I would find these sandals again. Glad I did because these are the only sandals that do not hurt my feet. I have not had a problem with them since the minute I put them on. Hope you never stop making these particular sandals, because I would never be able to find another pair that would come close to these. Keep making this style PLEASE. A forever customer.
customer_reviews.author: Judy Shelly

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable sandals!
customer_reviews.text: I Really love these sandals. I am very pleased with Clarks shoes! These are Wonderful! I received them timely, and then I broke my foot. It was so nice to be able to wear these sandals even with an Ace Bandage on the foot since the straps are Velcro..I was able to adjust the one sandal to fit me. ha! Wonderful, Comfortable Sandals! Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: G. Pemberton

customer_reviews.title: Love Clark's sandals!
customer_reviews.text: These are perfect for me. I finally got them in Navy! They are very comfortable & they last a long time. I have even washed mine in the washing machine & they still look great. I must have close to 10 pair right now. Of course the navy will get worn a lot. I may have to get another pair. I'm looking at the denim color next. I have back issues & I can wear these all day.
customer_reviews.author: Dee Dee

customer_reviews.title: Not my shade of red
customer_reviews.text: Have had another pair for over 2yrs before some signs of wear ....bought these and the company has changed the shade of red...disappointed and returned. Other wise a very comfortable sandal
customer_reviews.author: kristin

customer_reviews.title: Questionable two tone leather
customer_reviews.text: I have hard to fit wide size 11 feet, but these have delivered for me. The Velcro makes adjusting easy and not noticeable. It’s my third pair, navy, black, and this brown. The only thing I don’t like about these is I didn’t realize the leather is two toned. I didn’t know until I received them. But I’m keeping them regardless, because as I stated bigger wider feet leave me with limited choices.
customer_reviews.author: Trish

customer_reviews.title: Good slip on
customer_reviews.text: I found this sandal at Famous Footwear but only in pewter. I was able to try on and find my right size which was 7.5 c/d though I normally wear an 8.5. Obviously they run larger for me. So when I ordered on Amazon, I knew the exact size. I like that the straps adjust for each foot since my left foot is smaller. Feels good. I've walked a mile+ without a problem. The coral color I chose is nice, more orange than red. Attractive details on the straps. Heel height is good too--not too high, with nice stability. So far I'm pleased. The shoe stays on well with no slipping out that occurs with some slip-ons as you walk.
customer_reviews.author: nj buyer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Sandals!
customer_reviews.text: This is the third time I’ve ordered these Clark’s sandals. I wear them year-round, indoors and out. The insoles are cushiony and comfy, the support straps hits me in the right spots and the Velcro adjustments make it easy to achieve a custom fit. The pewter finish goes with everything, without looking “glitzty”. Love these sandals!
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Payton Cousineau

customer_reviews.title: LOVE the velcro!!!
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with the look, and most especially with the Velcro, making these adjustable!
customer_reviews.author: Lyn

customer_reviews.title: Great, Fabulous Sandal
customer_reviews.text: I love Clark's sandals. I wear them everyday, all year long. I hail from South Georgia where the weather is mild. They are extremely comfortable and perfect if you have fallen arches or a foot injury, as I do. I discovered them by accident in TJ Maxx and have been buying them from Amazon every year. The fit is always as expected and consistent among the various styles. My only complaint is that the fabric of the footbed begins to wear after six months or so on the edges, but the comfort is well worth buying a new pair. I hope Clark's never decides to retire this general type of sandal. Thank you Clark's!
customer_reviews.author: kimindixie

customer_reviews.title: Ordered this pair for my sister
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this pair for my sister and she had a problem with this pair. She said "on the left foot, there is a thread that rubs on my toes, it's kind of sharp. The thread is heavy nylon." I was going to return them for her, but decided to keep them for myself because that thread must not hit in a spot that would bother me. The last thing I needed was another pair since I just purchased two pairs this summer!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer Linda R.

customer_reviews.title: Adjustable to fit everyday..
customer_reviews.text: My previous pair of these sandals is 8 years old and still going strong.. I only wear them out to go get the mail or take out the trash or on a day when it rains and I’m just going to a drive thru.. the inside sole isn’t cream color anymore as they are sooo old.. So of course I was eager to buy the same shoe in three different colors..My new ones are the black, pewter, navy.. I love them.. The reason for same style is because I have Edema and makes it easy to adjust to fit my swollen feet to fit on the day..can’t live without these amazing sandals.. only slide on sandals I own.♥️
customer_reviews.author: msfoodie

customer_reviews.title: Great sandals - comfortable and easy to adjust
customer_reviews.text: I love these sandals - so much, in fact, that I now own three pairs in different colors. They're comfortable, easy to slip on, and my feet don't feel tired after wearing them all day. They're also easy to adjust - each cross-strap adjusts separately with Velcro, so you can tighten or loosen where necessary. I have narrow feet, so I need to make them fairly snug across the toes and mid-foot, but if I have a day where my feet swell, I just loosen them a little and go on.
customer_reviews.author: S. Crockett

customer_reviews.title: Love These Shoes
customer_reviews.text: Finding a pair of shoes that I can wear for more than an hour without hurting my feet is a constant search. I have donated more like-new shoes to charity than anyone I know. Found a pair of Clark's slide sandals...Wow! This is my second pair and line the first pair, these are comfortable, and day-long wearable right out of the box.
customer_reviews.author: Duchess10

customer_reviews.title: I have chemo-induced peripheral neuropathy and it was wonderful being able to adjust each strap as I needed ...
customer_reviews.text: Adjustable Velcro straps are so helpful. I wear a 6-1/2 in "dress" shoes including Clarks, and a 7 in sandals. My 7 in these fit without my toes hanging off. I do wish these had some arch support but I plan to wear them just a few hours at a time. I have chemo-induced peripheral neuropathy and it was wonderful being able to adjust each strap as I needed while wearing them. I would buy additional colors when needed. I love my pewter color.
customer_reviews.author: FastReader

customer_reviews.title: Most comfortable sandal I've ever worn.
customer_reviews.text: I have been trying various shoes and sandals for sometime now and when I tried on my first pair of these Clarks sandals, I sat right down and ordered two more in different colors! They actually fit comfortably! I've had some trouble getting a proper fit in a wide shoe and these are the first brand to actually be VERY comfortable! I love them!
customer_reviews.author: Share211

customer_reviews.title: Worst design ever
customer_reviews.text: Why would you make an adjustable shoe that has the Velcro facing the top of your foot when you make them larger? It jabs into your foot and makes it itchy as well as hurting. Making the Velcro area on top smaller would still give you plenty of room to adjust and not have it touch your skin. Back to the drawing board guys.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah Harmon

customer_reviews.title: Clarks Leisa Sandal
customer_reviews.text: Just didn't work for me. I have a wide foot and tried both the skinny version and the wider one and neither of them worked on my foot. The top part rubbed on the top of my foot. A good friend had the same shoe and a very narrow foot and it worked beautifully for her.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa P. Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Nice Sandals!
customer_reviews.text: All the straps are adjustable so that enables these sandals to be very comfortable. The material that one's foot rests on is soothing . Nice sandals!
customer_reviews.author: Seahawk Fan

customer_reviews.title: Love them...
customer_reviews.text: I love Clarks and these do not disappoint. Very comfortable and I love the colors. They are a bit pricey but I've bought too many cheaper sandals that I ended up not wearing after a few times because they weren't comfortable or the fit was off so I don't mind paying a little more for the quality.
customer_reviews.author: CAfarmgirlTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Comfy yet run small
customer_reviews.text: These are so much more comfortable than i thought they would be. When first putting them on, they seem flimsy and cheap. Definitely not the quality i thot they would be for the price i paid. Also, i take a size 9, i got a 9.5 just in case and I probably should have gotten a 10. They seem to run small. Even after all this, i must say, they are VERY comfortable and may just be worth it after all. Ill update review afrer a week of wearing.
customer_reviews.author: R. Hodgson

customer_reviews.title: Adjustable, comfortable and cute.
customer_reviews.text: I have arthritis and plantar fasciitis, as well as a large (11w) foot. This sandal is supportive, comfortable and cute - not an easy thing to pull off! I have this sandal in 4 colors now and they get me through the summer.
customer_reviews.author: Pupdrivesmenutz

customer_reviews.title: Quality has gone out the window.
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been wearing this style sandal for 4 years. I have purchased 5 pairs and love the fit and comfort. This recent purchase is junk. The guilty and materials have gone into the dumpster. I’ll have to fine another brand to buy. And I returned them immediately and still no refund.
customer_reviews.author: NY Reader

customer_reviews.title: Runs very large!
customer_reviews.text: I love Clarks shoes since they carry size 5, but sometimes they fit and sometimes not. This was the biggest NOT I've ever experienced with them. These sandals were so comfortable but alas they were more like a size 6 instead of a 5, so huge! There was no way I could wear them so back they go. Disappointed since I can't seem to find a comfortable white sandal in a size 5 these days.
customer_reviews.author: Charrie

customer_reviews.title: I love Clarks
customer_reviews.text: Nice product. Comfortable for a while. I must wear my shoes wrong as all of my shoes don't last long. They are comfortable for the first few days and then start hurting. I still use these, just wish I could find some where the comfort last. Clark shoes are the best from what I can tell.
customer_reviews.author: CG

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and Adjustable
customer_reviews.text: These are very comfortable-the foot pad is cushioned and smooth; sweaty feet don't stick to the foot pad. The velcro adjustments are not obvious but allow adjustment of snugness of fit. Great for extended walking days and would be great for pregnant feet as well. Good arch support as well.
customer_reviews.author: PHawk

customer_reviews.title: Love the white sandals
customer_reviews.text: I have a narrow foot and its extremely hard for me to find shoes to wear. The velcro is the only way I can wear Sandals. They are super comfy, esp if you are on your feet all day. The only thing, is that it doesnt look well for me to have the ends sticking out, in order for me to tighten. But I'm okay with that as long as they are comfy! I ordered the white first, then the black. For some reason the black are less comfy
customer_reviews.author: CHRIS M.

customer_reviews.title: Straps fully adjustable
customer_reviews.text: On these sandals, three straps are each separately adjustable, which means my bunions really fit in these sandals. The Velcro is same color as the straps, so the varying amount of exposed velcro isn't noticeable. The soles are deeply cushioned. The sandals slide onto my feet easily, but don't slip off when I'm walking. They aren't the best choice for longer walks, but they're super around the house on an ordinary day.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Just what I've been looking for.
customer_reviews.text: After reading some of the reviews I decided to purchase the shoes. They where just right, my feet swell sometimes and my regular shoes would not always fit, these shoes are able to adjust as my feet change. The shoes look good and are very comfortable, the heel is just the right height and good for my arches.
customer_reviews.author: Joyce

customer_reviews.title: Cute and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Once these shoes are broke in, they are very comfortable. The only part that required breaking in was the stitching on the straps, it rubbed a little at first, but quickly became soft and no longer a problem. I have wide feet so I always have to find something that will work and these fit perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Sunshine65

customer_reviews.title: Excited to have dressy sandals and mo pain.
customer_reviews.text: Oh my! I wore these to a bridal shower today and no pain at all.I was walking so good,I walked ofcand almost left my cane.They are sttlush ,I wish they made them in gold.I am so happy thst I purchased them.I have plantar fasciitis and I have pain but not today and wore them over 6 hours.Get a pair!!
customer_reviews.author: dsdaughter

customer_reviews.title: As pictured, ok narrow fit
customer_reviews.text: Fits pretty well for a narrow sandal, although did have to shorten/adjust the straps to keep it on. Not as much arch support and cushioning as I had hoped after having many other pairs of Clarks, so will likely not wear on days with lots of walking or hours on my feet. The tabs above the Velcro could have been a little more fashionable, but it is ok for a casual shoe. Very difficult to find casual, narrow sandals to fit. So many styles are only offered in M or W...wish more N/AA to choose from!
customer_reviews.author: jlm

customer_reviews.title: Most comfortable sandal I own!
customer_reviews.text: I was instantly in love with these sandals from the moment I opened the box! They fit perfectly and look nice too. My feet are very hard to fit and I almost never order or wear anything except Birkenstocks. I had heard a lot about Clarks from my friends so I decided to give them a try when I saw these at a great price on Amazon. I ordered my usual size and the fit and are so comfortable. No break-in period was required. I've worn them almost every day since I received them. I intend to order more. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Gale

customer_reviews.title: Gotta Love Clarks
customer_reviews.text: These Clarks sandals are more attractive the photo indicates. Very comfortable. Adjustable straps. I have long skinny feet, not fat, so my feet do slip a little in the sandals, but not enough to even bother. These were immediately comfortable and I didn't even have to break them in. Love them!
customer_reviews.author: BoomerRhonda

customer_reviews.title: Another new pair of sandals
customer_reviews.text: Let's see I have these in just about every color they are made in. When one pair finally wears out, it's demoted to house wear and I buy a new pair. Very comfortable style and since I live in the south, sandals are pretty much the shoe you wear much of the year. Wear an 8M and they are true to size.
customer_reviews.author: LynnAL

customer_reviews.title: These sandals are NOT as pictured!
customer_reviews.text: I thought the shoes would have the same color insole as pictured - dark tan, which helps hide the dirt. But, the insole is off-white (shows dirt easily). The comfort is good, but EXTREMELY disappointed that they have changed the insole color. Who wants a sandal that shows dirty foot marks? I will stop buying Clarks if they don't revert to the previous dark tan or black colored insoles.
customer_reviews.author: Y. M.

customer_reviews.title: Clarks are my favorite shoes
customer_reviews.text: I have worn Clarks for many years. I like to stick with them for mail/internet orders since I know what to expect. I know that they will fit and that the heel height will be comfortable. I also know that even in Florida I can expect a pair of Clarks sandals to last for at least a couple of seasons.
customer_reviews.author: C. Smith

customer_reviews.title: This one slipped by quality control.
customer_reviews.text: Loved this shoe just like all my other Clark shoes. The only reason I gave it 3 stars and not 5 was because they left some of the stitching too long and up it was rubbing on my foot. It was very uncomfortable. I know I could have sent it back, and maybe I should have, but I just tried to clip it myself. Pretty difficult. Have only worn it once so the jury is still out. I may still return if it still hurts. Otherwise, great shoe.
customer_reviews.author: yaya

customer_reviews.title: Insole is comfortable, so are the straps, soft and comfortable.  Fit to size.
customer_reviews.text: They are a great pair of sandals, I wear narrow and they really are narrow that they don’t look like boats on my feet. Very comfortable with the adjustable straps.
customer_reviews.author: Jean Trnka

customer_reviews.title: Clark's product quality is slipping, sorry to say
customer_reviews.text: A bit disappointed. I had purchased Clark's sandals before and these sandals quality is definitely inferior. They are attractive, true to size that is the positive but to be honest I find the inside of the shoe very uncomfortable because the lining is fabric not leather, feels like synthetic that keeps your feet sweaty and hot and the inside padding not what it used to be. You have made a sandal that looks good but does not feel good on my feet. You have skimped on the leather. Even the outer sole looks cheap. Definitely not worthy of the Clarks name. New customers may not notice but for those who have bought Clarks shoes over the years this is disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: georgette bozovich

customer_reviews.title: Buy, Buy, Buy
customer_reviews.text: I am going to purchase in several colors! I was worried that they would feel heavy( clunky,), but they are light and so comfortable. Ho westly, these sandal feel as if they were custom made for me. My Podiatrist wanted me to wear a better sandal...found them!
customer_reviews.author: Panda

customer_reviews.title: GOOD looking and Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I like these very much, unusual color that fits in with my life style. I opened the box, slipped the sandals on and away I went, fit is great for long, narrow feet.
customer_reviews.author: Frequent customer

customer_reviews.title: Most comfortable sandals I have
customer_reviews.text: Love these sandals. I already had a pair and they've done so well, I decided to get another. The velcro makes it easy to adjust the size if you have trouble with feet swelling and the footbed is very comfortable. Only sandals I have that I can wear all day shopping and don't have leg aches when I'm done. The color is a soft blue which blends with most other colors. Great pair of footwear!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Immediately Comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: My new Clarks Leisa Cacti Slides are an instant hit! Adjusted the straps to my fat wide foot (size 9 ww) and lo, a shoe that feels comfortable, and more importantly, supports these old feet just so fine! Got the size 9 wide, and could have done with the 8.5 w, but work well despite the 3/4 inch heel area space overage. Like the molded foot base, and they are not too heavy, but easy to walk in.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia M. Smith

customer_reviews.title: VERY COMFORTABLE
customer_reviews.text: I bought this item from Belk, about a year and a half ago. They are so comfortable that I wanted another pair but Belk no longer carried it. So I went to my old faithful.....Amazon. I bought a white and a black pair and am hoping that when I need to replace them Amazon will still carry them. LOVE THESE1
customer_reviews.author: Paula J.

customer_reviews.title: Clark sandals
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable. No break-in period needed. As another customer wrote, they do help with bunions. I wish the pewter color was a little greyer. The pewter color almost looks like rose gold. But they are very comfortable, especially with leather uppers.
customer_reviews.author: Joanne C.

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT!
customer_reviews.text: I usually purchased my Clark's on QVC but lately, the Clarks had been iffy and I don't know why. I wanted these sandals but QVC did not have the colors I wanted and on a whim, I searched on Amazon and VOILA - the style in the colors I wanted AND BONUS - THE SANDALS ARE AWESOME THANK YOU AMAZON - YOU ROCK!!!
customer_reviews.author: Rose Marie Q. Bensadon

customer_reviews.title: comfortable slid-on sandals that look great
customer_reviews.text: This is my second pair of these Clarks sandals. Comfortable right from the start, has support where it is needed, adjustable straps, and look great too. I have them in brown and now black. My brown pair is 6 years old and still looks and wears great. I wear them often too.
customer_reviews.author: kathleen farrell

customer_reviews.title: Hope you love these more than I did
customer_reviews.text: I don’t know who is making Clark’s shoes now, but they are the worst of the worst. I bought a black pair of these sandals about two years and loved them. I bought these brown shoes and they feel awful on my feet. Nothing like Clark’s shoes used to fit.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Rhoden

customer_reviews.title: Mostly Solid
customer_reviews.text: Overall a pretty comfy sandal. It's not super supportive, but it's starting to form to foot. I ordered wide and still have to let the Velcro show just a bit. Luckily mine are dark enough that it doesn't show, but I could see that being an issue for lighter colors.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beyond comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Probably the most comfortable sandals ever! Good arch support, exactly as pictured, got two pairs in different colors. Good value for leather. They do stretch out a bit but the straps are actually adjustable, which was a great surprise. They also clean very easily with no fading of color.
customer_reviews.author: Ecstatic Executive

customer_reviews.title: A little small for my foot
customer_reviews.text: I love the look and feel of the shoe. I ordered the same size I always order in Clarks. These were tight on me. I had to adjust the Velcro slightly in order to get my foot in comfortably. I’ve never had this problem with any of my other shoes by this brand.
customer_reviews.author: Jeanette

customer_reviews.title: Terrific shoes!
customer_reviews.text: I love these sandals. They are very comfortable to walk in because they are snug on my foot. They are adjustable with all three straps which is beneficial if you have any places on your foot that may need a little extra room. I love the color because it goes with anything, and can also look dressy. I have been pleased with all of the Clark shoes that I have purchased. They are well made and true to size.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fits just right!  Cute & comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: Love this shoe! It's cute, comfortable and fits me perfect! I wore it right out of the box all day long without any discomfort! I wear size 11 narrow and so seldom get to find affordable, cute shoes in my size. Thanks for having narrow sizing!!! Please offer narrows in more of your other styles too!
customer_reviews.author: Ducky

customer_reviews.title: Another Great Shoe by Clarks
customer_reviews.text: You can never go wrong with Clarks. I use these as daily house shoes as I need arch support at all times. I also use them when running errands and/or walking the dog. These are very comfortable and last a long time.
customer_reviews.author: C MTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Clarks comfort
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy with these sandals. They fit true to size and the three adjustable velcro straps make refining the fit a breeze. I got the blue color, which is a muted grayish-navy that looks great with blue jeans. They are comfortable to wear all day.
customer_reviews.author: joanieD

customer_reviews.title: No break-in required, nice colors
customer_reviews.text: Cute slip-on sandals. Comfortable right out of the box for wearing all day. I liked the coral ones in this same style, and after wearing them many times bought the blue ones recently. Both colors are delightful and look like they do on my computer screen. The coral is fun, and the blue is a toned-down grayish blue that will go with almost any casual outfit. Both pairs seem to be durable. Adjustable straps are a definite plus.
customer_reviews.author: P. Dickens

customer_reviews.title: Very Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Very Comfortable right out of the gate. Nice! It is a bit dorky looking, suggesting i'm older than I am. Aside from that, would totally recommend! I wish the heel were slightly taller...that would have erased some of the dorkiness.
customer_reviews.author: DT Linda Gross

customer_reviews.title: So comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: These sandals are so comfortable! These are my second set. I highly recommend them. Will buy again!
customer_reviews.author: dubbug

customer_reviews.title: Great Comfort, Color is a bit off?
customer_reviews.text: These are incredibly comfortable. However, the listed color is Navy Blue, but they are MUCH closer to black. I have a pair of these shoes in black and unless you put them side-by-side, you wouldn't know they were different colors. I'm keeping them anyway because they are SO COMFORTABLE!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great sandals, Clark quality
customer_reviews.text: I have quite a few pairs of this model in probably 3 colors rs. I have problem feet and Clarks shoes give me more support than most. The adjustable straps on this particular shoe are very helpful as my feet are 1/2 size different from one another. A recent development of gout in one foot made these a lifesaver for a while. But on an everyday warm weather use, they're my favorite.
customer_reviews.author: Caro

customer_reviews.title: Love My Clarks!
customer_reviews.text: These sandals have been a staple in my closet for the past several years. I have them in several different colors, they fit perfectly and are comfortable from the moment I put them on. Because I wear a Narrow width, I always read the reviews before I order online.
customer_reviews.author: vjs

customer_reviews.title: Cushioned, strap style works well with compression sleeves
customer_reviews.text: The foam-cushioned recessed heel cup is good for my flat pronating feet. The three adjustable straps are a good choice for wearing with a compression sleeve or bandage. The red leather looks like the photo: it's a nice toned down color like a reddish cognac. I always order a half size smaller when I buy Clarks.
customer_reviews.author: DW

customer_reviews.title: Such a good looking and comfortable fitting sandal!!!
customer_reviews.text: So glad that I found these shoes. I now own two pair of these sandals, one is white and the other is red. The velcro closure on each of the three straps make it so easy to adjust the fit. My right foot is ever so slightly larger than the left one. So, these velco straps make the shoe fit my feet exactly. Even when my feet swell, the straps can easily be adjusted for my comfort. I will probably order one or two more darker pairs for the autumn season. The straps are so soft and the shoes are made so well that they will probably last for several years.
customer_reviews.author: Betty Trobaugh

customer_reviews.title: This is a great shoe. The straps make it easy to adapt ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a great shoe. The straps make it easy to adapt the shoe to your foot height and width. In terms of width, the shoe is reasonably narrow. I have long and narrow feet and it fit perfectly. The material of the footbed is very soft and feels really nice. I ended up sending them back because I was not in love with the style (I like narrower straps and I like it better when the straps are not adjustable - just a style question though, I agree that it is a useful feature) but otherwise, great shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Tastet

customer_reviews.title: Great fit and comfort
customer_reviews.text: I love my Clark's Women Leisa Cacti sandals. They feel like they have molded to my feet. Very comfortable. Being able to customize the sandals by adjusting the straps is a great plus. And they are beautiful sandals as well.
customer_reviews.author: Helen S.

customer_reviews.title: Looks and comfort met the need
customer_reviews.text: So grateful that the Leisa Cacti Slide Sandal is comfortable. I might add though, that I had to file down (with an emery board) some understitchingg by the small toe. After the filing down the handle feels perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Sophy

product_meta.title: Clarks Women's Leisa Cacti Slide Sandal
product_meta.description: Contrast stitching and studded accents add interest to this women's collection. Made from smooth leather, it features three hook-and-loop closures for a custom fit, plus fabric linings, an ortholite foot bed, and a lightweight Eva outsole that cushions the foot in comfort. Slip on the Leisa cacti Q for effortless style on summer weekend getaways or everyday errands.
